description: The HpeSecurityService resource describes the properties for management of the security configuration of the BMC.

Links.description: The links array contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.

CertAuth.description: The value of this property shall be a reference to a resource of Type HpeCertAuth.

ESKM.description: The value of this property shall be a reference to a resource of Type HpeESKM.

HttpsCert.description: The value of this property shall be a reference to a resource of Type HpeHttpsCert.

SSO.description: The value of this property shall be a reference to a resource of Type HpeiLOSSO.

SecurityDashboard.description: The value of this property shall be a reference to a resource of Type HpeiLOSecurityDashboard.

TrustedOSSecurityModules.description: The value of this property shall be a reference to HPETrustedOSSecurityModules resource.

LoginSecurityBanner.description: This object describes the security banner displayed on the iLO login page and iLO SSH pre-authentication banner.

IsEnabled.description: Login security banner is enabled or not.

SecurityMessage.description: Text message to appear on the iLO login page and iLO SSH pre-authentication banner when login security banner is enabled.

EnableBackgroundScan.description: Enables or disables background scan of host OS software.

LastScanResult.description: Health of the host after the last scan done by Trusted OS Security scan engine.

enumDescriptions.OK: The last Trusted OS Security scan completed without finding any issues.
enumDescriptions.Critical: The last Trusted OS Security scan completed finding issue(s). Refer to the SL log for details.
enumDescriptions.Unknown: The health is Unknown because either the scan data is unavailable or scan is not enabled or last scan failed to complete.

LastScanTime.description: The time stamp of the last Trusted OS Security scan.

OnIntegrityFailure.description: Sets the policy for how the Trusted OS Security check handles integrity failures.

enumDescriptions.NoAction: No action will be taken when a failure is detected.
enumDescriptions.Alert: Generate an alert when a failure is detected.
enumDescriptions.PowerOff: Gracefully power system off when a failure is detected.
enumDescriptions.PowerOffForce: Force system power off when a failure is detected.
enumDescriptions.Reset: Reset system power off when a failure is detected.
enumDescriptions.ColdBoot: ColdBoot system power off when a failure is detected.
enumDescriptions.ForceNMI: ForceNMI system power off when a failure is detected.

ScanEverySeconds.description: Sets the interval between Trusted OS Security scans in second increments.

SSHHostKey.description: SSH Host Key identifying the service.

SecurityState.description: The operational security level of this Manager.

enumDescriptions.CNSA: Same as FIPS. Additionally meets the criteria for NSA Commercial National Security Algorithm suite.  Must be in FIPS mode to transition to CNSA.
enumDescriptions.FIPS: Similar to High Security. This mode is intended to meet the FIPS 140-2 level 1 and Common Criteria security requirements. A reset to defaults is required to exit this mode.
enumDescriptions.HighSecurity: Manager is operating in high security mode, requiring extra authentication on host interface(s), and stronger encryption on network interfaces.
enumDescriptions.Production: Manager is operating in a normal security mode.  Default state for new Systems.
enumDescriptions.SuiteB: Same as FIPS. Additionally meets the criteria for NSA SuiteB Top Secret installations.  Must be in FIPS mode to transition to SuiteB.
enumDescriptions.SynergySecurityMode: Synergy Security Mode is the mode supported by the Synergy Composer.
enumDescriptions.Wipe: Manager is currently wiping security related content and returning to a lower security mode.  This state will transition automatically when finished.

SecurityState.longDescription: The operational security level of this Manager. The valid values for this property are specified through the Redfish.AllowableValues annotation.

SecurityState@Redfish.AllowableValues.description: The supported values for the SecurityState parameter.
SecurityState@Redfish.AllowableValues.longDescription: The supported values for the SecurityState parameter.

iLOIDevID.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for iLO IDevId by this manager.

Certificates.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for iLO IDevId by this manager.

iLOLDevID.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for iLO LDevId by this manager.

Certificates.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for iLO LDevId by this manager.

SystemIDevID.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for System IDevId by this manager.

Certificates.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for System IDevId by this manager.

SystemIAK.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for System IAK by this manager.

Certificates.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for System IAK by this manager.

PlatformCert.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for PlatformCert by this manager.

Certificates.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for PlatformCert by this manager.

PlatformCertUpdate.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for PlatformCert Updates by this manager.

Certificates.description: This is a reference to a collection of certificates used for PlatformCert Updates by this manager.

title: #HpeSecurityService.v2_3_1.HpeSecurityService
